FDM 3D Printed Camera Accessories made in the U.K.

Manufacturing

All parts are made on my modified Prusa MK3S using PETG filament.

They are all hand finished and are tested using my cameras for fit and function.

Contact me at info@sparrowfabrications.co.uk.
